EmailTemplate.description: 777 Follow-up response where the customer has re-opened the case after our status reply was provided. Always add the CSM/CBM on copy with this response.
EmailTemplate.name: Order Expedite Request Best Date Provided
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Expedite Request {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
We have thoroughly evaluated the ability to support your requirement for an expedited shipping date and have provided the best date currently available even if that was the initial date provided.
We have noted your request and if situations change in our schedules, we will continue to look at possibilities to ship your order sooner. Ongoing status will be reflected in our portal at www.MyAerospace.com.
Your PO#: <Enter customer PO Number>
Honeywell Sales Order #: <Enter sales order number>
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
